name: INAddTasksTemporalEventTriggerUnsupportedReason
desc: Reasons the app can't create a task with a particular temporal event trigger.

items.name: case invalidRecurrence
items.desc: The temporal event trigger refers to an invalid or unsupported schedule for repeating a task.

items.name: case timeInPast
items.desc: The temporal event trigger refers to a moment or time span which has already occurred.
